title: Quinta do Arneiro
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Western, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Portuguese, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. All veg except for tuna. Deli counter inside the marketplace. Offers organic salads, pies, and crepes plus vegetable and fruit juices. Sources produce from its own organic farm.
streetAddress: Mercado da Ribeira, Avenida 24 de Julho
